Industry leaders choose us

Who we are

At Moolya Software Testing Private Limited, we lead globally in software testing and quality assurance, partnering with clients across industries to deliver top-tier solutions. Our services ranging from functional and automation to performance and security testing are designed to enhance software quality, efficiency, and productivity, ensuring client success and satisfaction.

Why Choose us

Skin in the Game

Culture Focus

Leadership Friendly

Scaling Value

We go beyond vendor roles, fostering deep co-ownership with customers.

We help customers address issues by focusing on cultural fixes.

Moolya empowers C-, V-, and D-level leaders with

insights.

Moolya unifies Tech, Test,

Product, Customer & Business

insights to scale value.

Our Quality Engineering Philosophy

At Moolya, we believe quality is not a checkpoint at the end, but a culture built into every stage of the product lifecycle.

Shift-Left Approach

Automation-First Strategy

Built-in Trust

We adopt a shift-left approach, focusing on prevention over detection.

Automation-first strategies ensure 70–85% coverage, accelerating release cycles.

Compliance, security, and reliability are integrated into every test stage.

Faster, safer, and more stable releases that reduce risk while improving user adoption.

Testing Solutions

Address unique challenges & requirements

Accelerated

Time to Market & Reduced Cost

Case Study

Cross-Platform Healthcare App

Challenge:

Ensuring functional consistency across Android, iOS, and Web for 200,000+ expectant and new parents while delivering a sensitive, emotionally positive user experience.

Approach:

• Automated 85% of regression testing across 50+ devices and OS versions.
• Focused on sentiment-driven features such as pregnancy tracker, polls, and healing mode.
• Validated admin panel and advertiser workflows for accurate targeting.

Impact:

• 35% faster release cycles through automation.
• 25% increase in app ratings (boosted positive reviews).
• 15% higher ad click-through rates, improving advertiser ROI.

Case Study 3

Healthcare Platform Integration

Challenge:

Testing integration across multiple modules (Quick Consult, Pharmacy, VC Dashboard), with critical workflows like video consultations and payments.

Approach:

• Designed and executed 1,500+ test cases across 5 modules.
• Verified RBAC for 30+ unique roles, including doctors, admins, and patients.
• Stress-tested pharmacy checkout and video consultations for peak usage.

Impact:

• Supported 5,000+ daily video consultations during pandemic surges.

Delivered 99.5% uptime for core modules.

Improved patient experience, with a 30% increase in daily active users.

Reduced pharmacy checkout time by 15%, boosting conversions.

Case Study 4

Fast-Paced Release Stability

Challenge:

Delivering high stability in a fast-paced release environment with bi-weekly updates across iOS, Android, and Web.

Approach:

Identified and resolved 200+ issues during 6 major updates in 3 months.

Focused on usability, staging-to-production validation, and regression stability.

Impact:

Achieved 95% bug-free releases.

Reduced post-release bugs by 50%, increasing confidence in releases.
